isis.stitle: Body Builder Electrical Data Book - SINGLE REDUCTION AXLES: SPICER S100-S, S105-S, S135-S, S150-S - LUBRICATION - AFTER OVERHAUL OR CHANGE INTERVALS

svcproc.title: AFTER OVERHAUL OR CHANGE INTERVALS
svcproc.para: When refilling the axle assembly, the housing should be filled to the proper level. Following an overhaul, the lubricant level must be checked and refilled after 24 hours of operation. This procedure is necessary to replenish the small amount of lubricant that is retained in the internal cavities and wheel ends during initial operation of the axle assembly.
